# init()

**Initializer**

Creates a new object capture session.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init()
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/ObjectCaptureSession/isSupported] needs to be true on the device in order to create a session.
title: init()
